common.title4: 5 star & All Inclusive hotels - Luxury villas rentals
common.texte1: At Heritage Resorts, experience much more than a holiday, discover the quintessence of the exclusive Domaine de Bel Ombre. The natural richness of the landscape, the history of the place and the rich culture allows our guests to bask in a wealth of experiences whilst enjoying the refinement and comfort of high end establishments.
common.texte2: Guests live fully each second of their stay, to take the time to appreciate the subtle pleasures of Mauritius, to immerse in each of these precious moments... so that, in turn, they can enrich, tell and spread the history of the Domaine de Bel Ombre.
